omega_u.message: width of the upper half of a (1-α)% confidence interval for ω.

omega_l.message: width of the lower half of a (1-α)% confidence interval for ω.

omit.message: Optional variable used to hide or ignore aliquots. Aliquots marked as (lowercase) '<tt>x</tt>' are plotted (except on KDEs and CADs) but ignored for numerical analysis; Aliquots marked as (uppercase) '<tt>X</tt>' are removed from both plots and calculations.

C.message: Optional variable to be used as fill colours in isochron and radial plots.

12sigma.message: (12σ%)
